author: rvaldes
subject: re: Goemon Mediacom doll
body:
Hey there!  I finally managed to get the *&^!$%^%#! scans up online (been 
having server trouble) so here is the url

http://www.panix.com/~neko/toys/lupin/index.html

Enjoy!

-------------
Original Text
From: "eat food" <bmmitch@bellsouth.net>, on 8/13/99 4:02 PM:
Someone on this list said he had the Goemon and Zenigata 12" dolls. 
He said he'd scan a picture of the Goemon for me. ;_;
Please? Or have you done so already?


-valerie 
http://members.tripod.com/~valerie
----------
Like rescuing precious stones that are confined in a safe...
It would be unjust to leave a girl here to be made a bride...
I will tell you the tale of the green fields.
This is the work of every thief.
-Lupin, Cagliostro no Shiro


6
